name: Paper Runner (aswin4550)
description:
Hello fellas, I’m Tintu. want to run on top of high raised buildings ? Join me! I have been running on top of these buildings for ages. Let me tell a short story about myself.

This game is based on a Character named Tintu (which is me of-course), who loves to run on top of the  high raised buildings, He is the person who seeks adventure. One day, Naruto came in Tintu’s dreams and blessed him. And from that day on, Tintu has been running along high raised buildings.

*FUN FACT* 

My creator: Aswin Baskaran

Launch Date:  31th January 2019

Price: $0 or Donate

Language: English

Platform: PC

Contact: aswin4550@gmail.com

Blog Link

https://aswinworks.blogspot.com/2019/01/paper-runner-lets-make-america-proud.htm...
